title: iOS Lead Developer
items: Maintained and developed new features for an IoT related app.
Created a foundation project to use in one client library of apps. The focus of this was to be able to reuse functionalities we already implemented.
Created an app to detect driver drowsiness using ARKit and a proof of concept using MLKit.

title: iOS Developer
items: Worked on the migration from React Native to Native of one client's crypto currency app.

title: iOS Developer, iOS Lead Engineer, Manager

subentries.title: Manager
items: Managed Buenos Aires office.
Involved in recruiting and retaining people for different teams. Reduced the recruitment process time by 20% by introducing a simple written test to evaluate candidates.

subentries.title: iOS Lead Engineer
items: Maintained and developed new features for a workforce management app. Managed a team of 4. We refactored the old codebase allowing near 50% increase in the implementation of experimental features

Maintained and developed new features for a white label banking app. Originally the project was designed for 5 credit unions, but the reception by users was so good that it was used in near 100 credit unions.

subentries.title: iOS Engineer Sr.
items: Development for several clients, industries ranging from financial to health and fitness.
Worked on the proposal and formalization of processes related to CI and the creation of a components library, to be used in all future projects.

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
items: Developed the native version of the previous hybrid app related to the real estate sector.

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
company: Overactive Inc. (now part of the Perficient Group)
items: Developed an app for a health insurance company based on Puerto Rico, whose main audience were senior citizens and people  with disabilities, the app introduced me to the world of accessibility
Rewrote an app for a payment processor in Central America that allowed the user to connect a card reader to the device and provide new payment methods for services.

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
company: Tradehelm Inc. (now part of the MajorKey group)
items: Maintenance of the main product for a client in US' financial sector.
Developed a VR application using Unity3D for an expo.

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
items: Implementation of new features for different apps.
Design and implementation of prototypes for new functionalities.

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
items: Development of games using Objective-C.
Developed with a teammate an internal tool to automate the translation of the games. The tool was written in C#

title: iOS Engineer Sr.
items: Game development using C++ and Objective-C.
Used Unity3D and Cocos2D (when using Objective-C), and a propieraty engine based on Cocos2DX when dealing with C++.

title: Software Engineer Sr.
items: Development using C# and Unity3D.
Game development.

title: Software Developer Junior - Software Developer SSR.
items: Development using Visual Basic, VBA and C++.
Developed a document organization system.
Developed a tool enabling business analysts to create full systems without programming skills.
Designed and implemented a plugin module to notify users about status of automated installations.
